name: InfracostInstaller
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of Infracost and prepend it to the PATH
author: Infracost

inputs.name: infracostVersion
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Infracost which should be installed on the agent if not already present

outputVariables.name: infracostLocation
outputVariables.description: The location of the infracost binary that was installed on the agent.

messages.InputVersionNotValidSemanticVersion: Input version %s is not a valid semantic version
messages.InfracostNotFoundInFolder: Infracost executable not found in path %s
messages.InfracostDownloadFailed: Failed to download Infracost from url %s. Error %s
